data.name: Tokyo School Life - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the official soundtrack for "Tokyo School Life". A fun-filled and emotional fusion of R&B slow jam ballads, new jack swing beats, patriotic school-age recorders, new-age ambience... even enka! Included as a bonus are the ringtones, direct from the phones of all three girls, in *.m4r format for use in your own phone!

Tracklist:
1. 萌えってらびゅーん！ / MOE to Love Yooou!
2. Mayonnaise Hills
3. The Gallant Tanuki
4. Maiden's Word
5. A New Leaf Everyday
6. Unreadable Air
7. Frail Petals
8. Intimidating Lapse
9. Delicate Sympathy
10. 萌えってらびゅーん！ (カラオケver.) / MOE to Love Yooou! (karaoke ver.)
11. まよねーずける / mayone-zukeru (BONUS)
12. クレイジー・ヘア・クラッシュ / Crazy Hair Clash (BONUS)
13. サムライは死ぬ事を恐れない / samurai wa shinu koto wo osorenai (BONUS)

All tracks composed, engineered, and produced by Jaelyn Nisperos.

Track 1 Credits:
Lyrics: RyoRca
Composer/Arrangement: Jaelyn Nisperos (chibi-tech)
Singer: Yuki Tedokon
Guitar: Masashi Yano
Vocal Recording Engineer: Raito (Transistar)
Vocal Director: Meroko. (Transistar)
Recording Studio: Transistar Studio
Mixing/Mastering Engineer: Andrew Richards (ACYCLIC SYSTEMS)
Song Director: RyoRca

© 2015 M2 Co., Ltd. / Dogenzaka Lab
